attributes.conditions: With Hilton Honors Gold status, you can enjoy benefits at hotels and resorts within the Hilton Portfolio and earn reward stays faster with Hilton Honors Bonus Points. Status automatically granted to cardmembers in good standing.
benefitsList: Earn 80% bonus Hilton Honors Bonus Points on eligible stays
Complimentary breakfast for up to 2 registered guests at participating hotels
attributes.enrollmentInstructions: Automatically enrolled. Status appears on Hilton Honors account within 8-12 weeks of card approval. No action required from cardmember.
